Name: Landmarks, Malcolm Shabazz Harlem Plaza, Manhattan (C 240301 HAM)
Title: Application number C 240301 HAM (Malcolm Shabazz Harlem Plaza) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 73 West 115th Street and 52-58 West 116th Street (Block 1599, Lots 9, 61, 62 and 64), Borough of Manhattan, Community District 9, Council District 10.
